heroBanner.title: Functional Materials for Clean Energy | Monash University Malaysia
heroBanner.subtitle: We focuses on III-V semiconductors and functional oxides for sensing, energy storage and photoelectrochemical applications. We combine nanofabrication, ferro-/piezoelectrics and advanced AFM technique to understand and modify surfaces and interfaces, improving conduction and charge transport across heterojunction. We dedicated our work to achieve clean energy.
